comment: Those of us who are anti-Trump have to deal with people who seem to inhabit an alternate universe. In Universe Beta, Trump just built a border wall, pulled our troops out of Syria, and successfully re-negotiated trade deals with multiple countries. Oh, and illegal immigration is at an all time low. What drugs are they smoking, and where can I find some?
